          </svg> <span>Sales Chat</span></a> 
        </div> 
        <div class="set"> <a href="https://login.siteground.com?lang=en" aria-label="Login to Site Area">
          <svg aria-hidden="true" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewbox="0 0 1727.896 1726.431">
           <title>icon_user</title><path d="M862.4,1726.4C402.121,1730.627-13.282,1349.375.325,834.055,12.383,377.422,394.175-1.078,866.623,0c468.456,1.072,861.809,380.239,861.272,868.086C1727.371,1344.217,1333.457,1730.3,862.4,1726.4Zm603.55-339.2c277.241-307.784,274.962-822.5-83.049-1131.085C1037.369-41.724,506.512,8.053,223.076,385.678c-271.4,361.6-155.158,803.982,40.145,998.019,82.45-132.332,191.371-238.234,321.4-323.4,19.882-13.023,32.855-16.159,53.524,3.1,61.764,57.563,136.162,89.6,221.574,90.209,90.456.651,168.835-32.184,234.871-93.205,15.664-14.474,27.471-16.607,44.035-3.593,51.835,40.726,106.395,78.294,155.744,121.8C1361.753,1238.016,1419.328,1306.736,1465.947,1387.191Z" /><path d="M549.824,683.237c2.35-96.811,28.987-185.565,104.108-254.36,72.031-65.964,158.748-87.5,253.193-75.518,201.52,25.568,286.714,203.505,268.735,380.27-9.376,92.191-42.693,173.845-104.868,244.256-111.688,126.482-303,126.592-414.837-.827C582.654,893.313,552.417,794.439,549.824,683.237Z" />

        </div> <a href="#" class="open-main-nav" aria-label="Open main navigation">
         <div>
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" id="Layer_1" x="0px" y="0px" width="44px" height="36px" viewbox="0 0 44 36" enable-background="new 0 0 44 36" xml:space="preserve">
           <path fill="#444444" d="M44 6c0 1.104-1.061 2-2.026 2H1.749C0.783 8 0 7.104 0 6V2c0-1.104 0.783-2 1.749-2h40.225C42.939 0 44 0.896 44 2V6z" /><path fill="#444444" d="M44 20c0 1.104-1.061 2-2.026 2H1.749C0.783 22 0 21.104 0 20v-4c0-1.104 0.783-2 1.749-2h40.225C42.939 14 44 14.896 44 16V20z" /><path fill="#444444" d="M44 34c0 1.104-1.061 2-2.026 2H1.749C0.783 36 0 35.104 0 34v-4c0-1.104 0.783-2 1.749-2h40.225C42.939 28 44 28.896 44 30V34z" />

    <script type="text/javascript">

        function showCookieNotice() {
            window.open("https://www.siteground.com/term/117.htm",'Use of cookies','scrollbars=yes,width=600,height=500');

   <script>
    $('document').ready(function() {
		$('.header-help-channel').eq(0 ? 0 : 1).show();
    });

   <section class="pusher" id="main-content" role="main"> 
    <section id="blogNav" class="background-wrap earth-10 depth-10"> 
     <div class="fit-wide p0"> 
      <nav class="sub-navigation"> 
       <ul style="display:none" class="sub-navigation__list sub-navigation__list--orientation-horizontal visible-links"> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item"> <a href="/blog" class="title title--upper title--weight-medium title--size-small"> Blog </a> </li> 
        <div aria-hidden="true" class="sub-navigation__separator">
         |
        </div> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item "> <a href="/blog/category/product-updates">Service Updates</a> </li> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item "> <a href="/blog/category/community">Community</a> </li> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item "> <a href="/blog/category/wordpress">WordPress</a> </li> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item "> <a href="/blog/category/security">Security</a> </li> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item "> <a href="/blog/category/design">Design</a> </li> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item "> <a href="/blog/category/development">Development</a> </li> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item "> <a href="/blog/category/business">Business Tips</a> </li> 
        <li id="blogSubNav" class="sub-navigation__item" style="display:none;"> <a href="#"> <span id="blogSubNavLabel">More</span> <span class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_12"> 
           <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="50" height="50" viewbox="0 0 32 32">
            <polygon points="16,26 0,12.4 0,6 16,19.6 32,6 32,12.4 "></polygon>
           </svg> </span> </a> 
         <ul class="sub-navigation__list sub-navigation__list--orientation-vertical hidden-links"> 
         </ul> </li> 
        <li class="sub-navigation__item sub-navigation__item-search"> <a href="#modal-search" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in"> <span class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_16 sg-icon--search"> 
           <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewbox="0 0 18 18" fill="#ccc">
            <path d="M11.926,11.081A6.748,6.748,0,1,0,6.751,13.5a6.633,6.633,0,0,0,4.331-1.575L17.213,18,18,17.213ZM6.751,12.375a5.623,5.623,0,1,1,3.994-1.631A5.624,5.624,0,0,1,6.751,12.375Z" transform="translate(0 0)" />
           </svg> </span> </a> </li> 
       </ul> 
      </nav> 
     </div> 
    </section> 
    <div style="display: none"> 
     <div id="modal-search" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dlform text--wrapper800"> 
       <form id="download_form" method="get" class="grid2" action="/blog/search"> 
        <div class="input-wrap search-field"> <span class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_16 sg-icon--search"> 
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewbox="0 0 18 18" fill="#ccc">
           <path d="M11.926,11.081A6.748,6.748,0,1,0,6.751,13.5a6.633,6.633,0,0,0,4.331-1.575L17.213,18,18,17.213ZM6.751,12.375a5.623,5.623,0,1,1,3.994-1.631A5.624,5.624,0,0,1,6.751,12.375Z" transform="translate(0 0)" />
          </svg> </span> 
         <input id="sitewide-search" type="text" name="s" placeholder="Type a keyword" autofocus="true" value=""> 
        </div> 
       </form> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <script type="text/javascript">


  var hlinks = $('.sub-navigation .hidden-links');
  var vlinks = $('.sub-navigation .visible-links');
  var subNav = $('#blogSubNav');
  var breaks = [];

 //UX optimisation: Prevents users to see unprocessed menu
  vlinks.show();

  //Performance optimisation: Save the elements instead of selecting them every time
  var vlinkCollection = vlinks.children().toArray();
  var hlinkCollection = [];

  function updateBlogNav() {

      //Calculate the available space
      var availableSpace = $('#header > div').width()*0.9;

      //Calculate the sum of all links widths
      var navWidth = vlinkCollection.reduce(function(total, link) {

          if (link.className && link.className.includes('search')) {
              return total;
          }

          return total + link.offsetWidth;
      }, 0)


      // The visible list is overflowing the nav
      if (navWidth > availableSpace) {
          subNav.show();
          //No need for calculations
          if (vlinkCollection.length < 3) {
              return;
          }

          // Record the width of the nav
          breaks.push(navWidth);

          //Copy and reverse the array
          var reverseVlinkCollection = vlinkCollection.slice().reverse();

          $(reverseVlinkCollection).each(function(index, link) {
             var className =  link.className;

             if (link.id != 'blogSubNav' &&
                 (!className.includes('sub-navigation__item--active') ||
                     (className.includes('sub-navigation__item--active') && vlinkCollection.length < 5)) &&
                 (!className.includes('sub-navigation__logo')
                  && !className.includes('sub-navigation__item-search'))) {

                 //Adds the link to the hidden links array
                 hlinkCollection.unshift(link);

                 //Removes the link from the visible links array
                 vlinkCollection = vlinkCollection.filter(function(item) {
                     return item != link;
                 })

                 link = $(link);

                 // Change the lable of the dropdown and hide the last link
                 if (className.includes('sub-navigation__item--active')) {
                     subNav.find('#blogSubNavLabel').html(link.find('a').text())
                     link.hide();
                 }


                 //Adds the link to the dropdown
                 link.prependTo(hlinks);
                 return false;
             }

          });


          // Recur if the visible list is still overflowing the nav
          updateBlogNav();

      // The visible list is not overflowing
      } else {

          // There is space for another item in the nav
          if (availableSpace > breaks[breaks.length - 1]) {
              link = hlinks.children().first();


              if (!link.attr('class')) {
                  subNav.hide();
                  return;
              }

              //Change the label of the dropdown menu
              if (link.attr('class').includes('sub-navigation__item--active')) {
                  subNav.find('#blogSubNavLabel').html('More')
                  link.show();
              }

              //Adds the link to the visible links array
              vlinkCollection.push(link[0]);

              //Removes the link from the hidden links array
              hlinkCollection = hlinkCollection.filter(function(item) {
                       return item != link[0];
              });

              //Returns the link in the visible navigation
              link.insertBefore(subNav);
              breaks.pop()

              // Recur in case there is more availableSpace
              updateBlogNav();

              if (hlinkCollection.length == 1) {
                  link = hlinks.children().first();
                  vlinkCollection.push(link[0]);
                  link.insertBefore(subNav);
                  hlinkCollection = hlinkCollection.filter(function(item) {
                      return item != link[0];
                  });

                  subNav.hide();
              }

              if (!hlinkCollection.length) {
                  subNav.hide();
              }
          }

      }

  }


  $(window).on('resize', updateBlogNav);

  updateBlogNav();

  $('.sub-navigation__item-search').magnificPopup({
      closeBtnInside: false,
      delegate: 'a',
      removalDelay: 500,
      callbacks: {
          beforeOpen: function() {
              this.st.mainClass = this.st.el.attr('data-effect');
          }
      },
      mainClass: 'mfp-no-margins mfp-with-zoom mfp-fade',
      zoom: {
          enabled: true,
          duration: 300
      },
      focus: '#sitewide-search',
      midClick: true // allow opening popup on middle mouse click. Always set it to true if you don't provide alternative source.
  });

</script>

           <h3 class="title title--density-small title--regular title--size-medium title--weight-normal color-darkest"> <a href="/blog/how-website-speed-affects-seo-rankings/">How Website Speed Affects Your SEO Rankings?</a> </h3>

         <div class="post-listing flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end post-latest"> <a href="/blog/green-web-hosting/"> 
           <div class="image-hover--overlay-white">
            <img width="790" height="390" src="https://d1lf7jq9a5epx3.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/04/earth-day-blog-post-1200x600-1-790x390.jpg" class="sg-post-image wp-post-image" alt="" sizes="100vw">
           </div> </a> 
          <div class="post-listing__content"> 
           <ul class="list-dots post-listing__content__tag"> 
            <li class="list-dots__item"> <a href="/blog/category/product-updates" class="title title--regular title--weight-bold title--size-xsmall title--upper color-blue">Service Updates</a> </li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3 class="title title--density-small title--regular title--size-medium title--weight-normal color-darkest"> <a href="/blog/green-web-hosting/">Green Web Hosting And SiteGround's Commitment To Sustainability</a> </h3> 
           <p class="text text--size-medium color-darkest post-listing__content__desc">Data centers play a big role in the Internet industry: they store, process and deliver all the websites' information on their non-stop running servers. They</p> 
          </div> 
          <div class="post-listing__footer text text--size-small color-dark"> 
           <ul class="list-dots"> 
            <li class="list-dots__item"> Apr 22, 2021 </li>

           <h3 class="title title--density-small title--regular title--size-medium title--weight-normal color-darkest"> <a href="/blog/optimizing-the-ram-utilization-by-the-mysql-on-the-cloud/">Optimizing the RAM Utilization by the MySQL on the Cloud</a> </h3> 
           <p class="text text--size-medium color-darkest post-listing__content__desc">Over the last 6 months, it has been all about speed at SiteGround. We have boosted the performance of the websites hosted with SiteGround up</p>

        <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-large title--line-top-left title--weight-bold color-darkest mt10">Sign Up For<br>More Awesome Content!</h2>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    //Magnific Popup
    $('#modalbox-subscribe').magnificPopup({
        delegate: 'a',
        removalDelay: 500, //delay removal by X to allow out-animation
        callbacks: {
            beforeOpen: function() {
                this.st.mainClass = this.st.el.attr('data-effect');
            }
        },
        midClick: true // allow opening popup on middle mouse click. Always set it to true if you don't provide alternative source.
    });
</script>
    <div style="display: none;">

     <div id="confirmation" class="mfp-with-anim confirmation-popup">

        <div class="density--semimedium no-padding--top center-elem--767"> 
         <div aria-hidden="true" class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_144 sg-icon--color-mango sg-icon--fill-lighter">

         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Please check your email to confirm your subscription.</p>

    </div> 
    <script>

    var blog_subscribing_started = false;


    $(document).ready(function(ev) {
        $('.subscribe-popup').find('.btn-submit').on('click', function(ev) {
            ev.preventDefault();
            let form = $(this).closest('.subscribe-popup').find('form');

            if (blog_subscribing_started || $(this).hasClass('btn-disabled')) {
                return;
            }

            blog_subscribing_started = true;
            blog_subscription_hide_errors(form);
            blog_subscription_send_form(form);
        });

    })


    function blog_subscription_recaptcha_callback() {
        $('.btn-disabled').removeClass('btn-disabled');
    }

    function blog_subscription_hide_errors(form) {
        form.find('.sg-validation--error').hide();
        form.find('.field-wrapper').removeClass('sg-field-wrapper--focused sg-field-wrapper--error');
    }

    function blog_subscription_show_errors(form, errors)
    {
        let fields = Object.keys(errors);

        form.find('.field-wrapper').addClass('sg-field-wrapper--success');

        fields.forEach(function(field) {
            let selector = '.'+field;
            let fieldWrappers = form.find(selector);

            fieldWrappers.each(function(index, wrapper) {
                console.log(wrapper);
                $(wrapper).find('.sg-validation--error').show();
                $(wrapper).find('.sg-validation--error').html(errors[field]);
                $(wrapper).find('.field-wrapper').removeClass('sg-field-wrapper--success');
                $(wrapper).find('.field-wrapper').addClass('sg-field-wrapper--focused sg-field-wrapper--error');
            });
        });
    }

    function blog_subscription_show_confirmation() {
        $.magnificPopup.open({
            items: {
                src: '#confirmation',
                type: 'inline'
            }
        });
    }

    function blog_subscription_send_form(form) {

        let data = new FormData(form[0]);

        var url = '/blog/subscription/ajax?object=Blog&ajaxAction=subscribe';

        $.ajax({
            url: url,
            type: 'POST',
            data: data,
            contentType: false,
            processData: false,
            dataType: "json",
            success:function(response, textStatus){

                blog_subscribing_started = false;


                if ('fail' === response.status)  {
                    blog_subscription_show_errors(form, response.data);
                    grecaptcha.reset();
                    return;
                }

                blog_subscription_show_confirmation();
            },
            error: function(response, textStatus) {
                blog_subscribing_started = false;
            }
        });
    }
</script> <!-- Featured Posts --> 
    <section class="highspot background-wrap white">

        <div class="post-listing__content"> 
         <ul class="list-dots post-listing__content__tag">

         </ul> 
         <h3 class="title title--density-small title--regular title--size-medium title--weight-normal color-darkest"> <a href="/blog/moving-to-google-cloud/">Moving to Google Cloud</a> </h3> 
        </div>

      <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-large title--line-center title--weight-bold title--cap color-darkest acenter mb10"> Not a SiteGround client yet? </h2> 
      <p class="title title--subtitle title--size-semimedium title--weight-normal color-dark title--subtitle-density-large acenter"> Take a look at our hosting service and see how we can make your online experience better and your website faster. </p>

          <div class="card__content flex--margin-start-top"> <span class="title title--upper title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-semismall color-light">Reliable</span>

          <div aria-hidden="true" class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_64 sg-icon--color-ocean sg-icon--fill-lighter acenter">

            <title>icon_cloud_hosting</title><rect x="-0.594" y="-0.09" width="65.174" height="64.293" fill="#fff" opacity="0" /><g id="e65273ab-58ad-4a78-91da-6fad00d84bc4" data-name="Cloud">
             <polygon points="42.369 9.941 50.022 15.173 51.648 23.853 60.152 27.791 61.993 35.638 55.337 44.871 8.572 44.992 2.103 37.718 3.622 33.841 5.017 30.083 10.198 28.244 14.255 20.069 14.668 19.156 26.107 17.613 32.447 10.475 42.369 9.941" class="sgmaincolor" />
             <path d="M62.723,35.467l-1.714-7.3.018-.061a1.286,1.286,0,0,0-.56-.992l-8.154-3.775-1.554-8.3a.747.747,0,0,0-.314-.481L43.062,9.506a.728.728,0,0,0-.337-.387.742.742,0,0,0-.661-.006l-.217.1-9.441.51a.747.747,0,0,0-.52.251l-6.155,6.928L14.568,18.412l-.013.005s-.01,0-.016,0c-.024,0-.042.022-.065.028a.729.729,0,0,0-.186.081c-.012.007-.026.009-.038.016s-.022.007-.031.014-.022.03-.035.042a.481.481,0,0,0-.055.037.738.738,0,0,0-.081.127c-.015.024-.041.038-.053.064l-.083.169L9.661,27.639,4.766,29.376a.7.7,0,0,0-.082.051.722.722,0,0,0-.149.081c-.009.007-.012.018-.02.026a.625.625,0,0,0-.076.094.812.812,0,0,0-.1.16c0,.013-.017.021-.022.034l-1.39,3.746L1.405,37.444a.751.751,0,0,0,.137.772l6.47,7.274a.749.749,0,0,0,.56.252h0l46.765-.122h0a.788.788,0,0,0,.193-.027.524.524,0,0,0,.065-.027.484.484,0,0,0,.047-.021.446.446,0,0,0,.05-.022c.013-.007.027-.009.039-.017l.012-.011a.783.783,0,0,0,.2-.186h0l.005-.007v0L62.6,36.076A.75.75,0,0,0,62.723,35.467ZM17.946,44.218l-6.55-15.1,13.8,1.424,6.289,13.636Zm27.445-15.1L27.642,17.707l14.2-6.821Zm5.817-3.429,2.726,15.524-6.56-10.474ZM26.813,18.958,45.286,30.837,32.867,43.6,26.453,29.69C26.491,28.561,26.717,21.848,26.813,18.958Zm-1.808,9.169c-2.164-2.1-6.627-6.423-8.7-8.435l9.028-1.218ZM14.91,20.435l8.71,8.44L11.352,27.609l.268-.544Zm-5.121,8.75,4.9,11.284-8.4-10.04ZM46.335,31.91l7.65,12.214L34.4,44.175Zm6.3-6.773,6.78,3.139-3.892,13.3Zm-1.781-1.456-3.973,5.233L43.512,11.63l5.83,3.986ZM32.8,11.208l5.525-.3-9.178,4.41ZM2.969,37.563,4.325,34.1l.945-2.548,10.6,12.668-6.962.018Zm54.316,3.322,2.869-9.8,1.031,4.393Z" />
            </g>
           </svg> 
          </div> 
          <div class="card__content flex--margin-start-top"> <span class="title title--upper title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-semismall color-light">autoscalable</span> 
           <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-bold title--size-semimedium title--cap title--subtitle-density-medium">Cloud<br> Hosting</h3> 
          </div> 
          <div> <a href="/cloud-hosting.htm?utm_source=blogresources" class="btn btn--size-semi-large btn--text-regular btn--density-large btn--bg-orange">Learn More</a> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div> <!-- Navigation buttons --> 
       <div class="swiper-button-prev"></div> 
       <div class="swiper-button-next"></div> 
      </article> 
     </div> 
    </section>

  <section id="chat-popup" class="chat-popup background-wrap border-plus-shadow highspot" style="display: none;"> 
   <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-medium title--line-top-left title--weight-bold title--cap color-white title--subtitle-density-small mt20"> Hi there! </h2> 
   <div class="grid2 grid--gap-medium background-wrap"> 
    <div class="abstract-half-dot abstract-whole-dot--small-circle abstract-whole-dot--small-radius abstract-half-dot--top-circle abstract-half-dot--negative-right-circle"></div> 
    <div class="abstract-half-dot abstract-whole-dot--small-circle abstract-whole-dot--small-radius abstract-whole-dot--negative-bottom-circle abstract-half-dot--negative-left-circle"></div> 
    <p class="text text--size-medium color-white"> Wed love to help you choose hosting for your project! </p> 
    <div> <a href="#" onclick="Live.launch(event)" class="btn btn--size-medium btn--text-regular btn--density-medium btn--bg-orange"> CHAT WITH US </a> 
    </div> <span class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_144 sg-icon--color-mango sg-icon--fill-lighter">

      <h4 class="title title--regular title--upper title--density-extrasmall no-padding--top title--weight-medium title--size-xsmall color-light">Recent From Blog</h4> 
      <article> 
       <div class="text text--size-small">
        <a class="text-link--color-lightest" href="/blog/moving-to-php-7-4/" title="Moving to PHP 7.4 and Discontinuing Some Old Versions" target="_blank">Moving to PHP 7.4 and Discontinuing Some Old Versions</a>
       </div> 
       <ul class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <li>

      </article> 
      <article>

  </footer> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
var width = null;
var orientation = null;
var headerFixedClass = false;
var inPageVatStatus = false;
var vatSwitchInProgress = false;

var urlMappings = {
				'us': 'siteground.com',				'uk': 'siteground.co.uk',				'es': 'siteground.es',				'it': 'it.siteground.com',				'de': 'siteground.com',				'eu': 'siteground.com',				'au': 'siteground.com',				'la': 'es.siteground.com',				'ww': 'siteground.com'			};

var hostnamePrefix = null;

var sCoRegionMapping = {
		'us': 'MWc9PQ==',		'uk': 'MEE9PQ==',		'es': 'MFE9PQ==',		'it': 'MUE9PQ==',		'de': 'MDBVPQ==',		'eu': 'MXc9PQ==',		'au': 'Mnc9PQ==',		'la': 'Mmc9PQ==',		'ww': 'MHc9PQ=='	};

function formatPriceHalfDown(value) {
	var exp = -2;
	value = +value;
	exp = +exp;
	type = 'round';

    	var difference = (parseFloat(value) * 100) - (Math.floor(value * 100));
	if (difference <= 0.5 && difference !== 0) {
		type = 'floor';
	}
    
	// If the value is not a number or the exp is not an integer...
	if (isNaN(value)) {
		return 0;
	}

	// Shift
	value = value.toString().split('e');
	value = Math[type](+(value[0] + 'e' + (value[1] ? (+value[1] - exp) : -exp)));
	// Shift back
	value = value.toString().split('e');
	value = +(value[0] + 'e' + (value[1] ? (+value[1] + exp) : exp));

	return value.toFixed(2);
}

function fixLongFloatNumbers(number) {
	return parseFloat(number.toFixed(4));
}

function vatMultiply(string, multi)
{
	var amountWithVat = 0;
	var returnStr = '';

	// In case there are empty vatPriceElement spans
	if (string === '') return '';

	var thousandsRegex = /\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g;
	var currency = string.charAt(0);
	var amount = string.substr(1);

	// Calculate
	amountWithVat = fixLongFloatNumbers(parseFloat(amount.replace(',','')) * multi);
	returnStr = formatPriceHalfDown(amountWithVat);
	// Add curreny add commas for thousands
	returnStr = curre
